abstract: Dario Vidošić (Croatian pronunciation: [ˈdarioː ˈʋidoːˈʃit͡ɕ]; born 8 April 1987) is a Croatian Australian footballer who plays for FC Sion and Australia national football team, as an attacking midfielder.
comment: Dario Vidošić (Croatian pronunciation: [ˈdarioː ˈʋidoːˈʃit͡ɕ]; born 8 April 1987) is a Croatian Australian footballer who plays for FC Sion and Australia national football team, as an attacking midfielder.
name: Dario Vidošić
